attributes.action: Call a General election, As the people of the UK call a vote of no confidence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the handling of the Northern Rock affair and the loss of 25 million citizens personal details. We call a vote of no confidence in the Government and petition for a general election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
